   16: 
   17: -module(login_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: -define(REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT, 2).  %% seconds
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [
   36:      {group, register},
   37:      {group, bad_registration},
   38:      {group, bad_cancelation},
   39:      {group, registration_timeout},
   40:      {group, change_account_details},
   41:      {group, login},
   42:      {group, login_scram},
   43:      {group, login_scram_store_plain},
   44:      {group, legacy_auth},
   45:      {group, messages}
   46:     ].
   47: 
   48: groups() ->
   49:     [{register, [sequence], [register,
   50:                              already_registered,
   51:                              check_unregistered]},
   52:      {bad_registration, [no_sequence], [null_password]},
   53:      {bad_cancelation, [no_sequence], [bad_request_registration_cancelation,
   54:                                        not_allowed_registration_cancelation]},
   55:      {registration_timeout, [sequence], [registration_timeout,
   56:                                          registration_failure_timeout]},
   57:      {change_account_details, [no_sequence], [change_password,
   58:                                               change_password_to_null]},
   59:      {login, [sequence], all_tests()},
   60:      {login_scram, [sequence], scram_tests()},
   61:      {login_scram_store_plain, [sequence], scram_tests()},
   62:      {legacy_auth, [sequence], [legacy_successful_plain,
   63:                                 legacy_unsuccessful_plain,
   64:                                 legacy_successful_digest,
   65:                                 legacy_blocked_user]},
   66:      {messages, [sequence], [messages_story, message_zlib_limit]}].
   67: 
   68: scram_tests() ->
   69:     [log_one, log_one_scram].
   70: 
   71: all_tests() ->
   72:     [log_one,
   73:      log_non_existent_plain,
   74:      log_one_digest,
   75:      log_non_existent_digest,
   76:      log_one_scram,
   77:      log_non_existent_scram,
   78:      blocked_user
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: suite() ->
   82:     escalus:suite().
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Init & teardown
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: 
   88: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   89:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   90: 
   91: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   93: 
   94: init_per_group(register, Config) ->
   95:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
   96: init_per_group(bad_registration, Config) ->
   97:     Config;
   98: init_per_group(bad_cancelation, Config) ->
   99:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
  100: init_per_group(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  101:     case escalus_users:is_mod_register_enabled(Config) of
  102:         true ->
  103:             set_registration_timeout(Config);
  104:         _ ->
  105:             {skip, mod_register_disabled}
  106:     end;
  107: init_per_group(change_account_details, Config) ->
  108:     skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config);
  109: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) when
  110:       GroupName == login_scram; GroupName == login_scram_store_plain ->
  111:     case get_auth_method() of
  112:         external ->
  113:             {skip, "external authentication requires plain password"};
  114:         _ ->
  115:             config_password_format(GroupName),
  116:             Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
  117:             assert_password_format(GroupName, Config2)
  118:     end;
  119: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  120:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
  121: 
  122: end_per_group(register, _Config) ->
  123:     ok;
  124: end_per_group(change_account_details, Config) ->
  125:     ok;
  126: end_per_group(bad_registration, _Config) ->
  127:     ok;
  128: end_per_group(bad_cancelation, _Config) ->
  129:     ok;
  130: end_per_group(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  131:     Config1 = restore_registration_timeout(Config);
  132: end_per_group(login_scram, Config) ->
  133:     set_store_password(plain),
  134:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]});
  135: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  136:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
  137: 
  138: init_per_testcase(DigestOrScram, Config) when
  139:       DigestOrScram =:= log_one_digest; DigestOrScram =:= log_non_existent_digest;
  140:       DigestOrScram =:= log_one_scram; DigestOrScram =:= log_non_existent_scram;
  141:       DigestOrScram =:= legacy_successful_digest ->
  142:     case get_auth_method() of
  143:         external ->
  144:             {skip, "external authentication requires plain password"};
  145:         ldap ->
  146:             {skip, "ldap authentication requires plain password"};
  147:         _ ->
  148:             escalus:init_per_testcase(DigestOrScram, Config)
  149:     end;
  150: init_per_testcase(check_unregistered, Config) ->
  151:     Config;
  152: init_per_testcase(change_password, Config0) ->
  153:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(change_password, Config0),
  154:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice]});
  155: init_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config0) ->
  156:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config0),
  157:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice]});
  158: init_per_testcase(bad_request_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  159:     Config1 =  escalus:init_per_testcase(bad_request_registration, Config0),
  160:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice]});
  161: init_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  162:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config0),
  163:     Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice]}),
  164:     %% Use a configuration that will not allow inband cancelation (and
  165:     %% registration).
  166:     restart_mod_register_with_option(Config2, access, {access, none});
  167: init_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config) ->
  168:     ok = deny_everyone_registration(),
  169:     escalus:init_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config);
  170: init_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config) ->
  171:     Listeners = [Listener
  172:                  || {Listener, _, _} <- escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [listen])],
  173:     [{_U, Props}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [hacker]}),
  174:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Props),
  175:     case lists:keymember(Port, 1, Listeners) of
  176:         true ->
  177:             escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [hacker]}),
  178:             escalus:init_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config);
  179:         false ->
  180:             {skip, port_not_configured_on_server}
  181:     end;
  182: init_per_testcase(Name, Config)
  183:   when Name == blocked_user; Name == legacy_blocked_user ->
  184:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  185:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(acl, add, [Domain, blocked, {user, <<"alice">>}]),
  186:     escalus:init_per_testcase(Name, Config);
  187: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  188:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  189: 
  190: end_per_testcase(Name, Config)
  191:   when Name == blocked_user; Name == legacy_blocked_user ->
  192:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  193:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(acl, delete, [Domain, blocked, {user, <<"alice">>}]),
  194:     Config;
  195: end_per_testcase(change_password, Config) ->
  196:     [{alice, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice]}),
  197:     Alice = {alice, lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Details, {password, strong_pwd()})},
  198:     {ok, result, Response} = escalus_users:delete_user(Config, Alice);
  199: end_per_testcase(change_password_to_null, Config) ->
  200:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice]});
  201: end_per_testcase(message_zlib_limit, Config) ->
  202:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [hacker]});
  203: end_per_testcase(check_unregistered, Config) ->
  204:     Config;
  205: end_per_testcase(bad_request_registration_cancelation, Config0) ->
  206:     true = user_exists(alice, Config0),
  207:     escalus:delete_users(Config0, {by_name, [alice]});
  208: end_per_testcase(not_allowed_registration_cancelation, Config) ->
  209:     restore_mod_register_options(Config),
  210:     true = user_exists(alice, Config),
  211:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice]});
  212: end_per_testcase(registration_timeout, Config) ->
  213:     escalus_users:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]});
  214: end_per_testcase(registration_failure_timeout, Config) ->
  215:     ok = allow_everyone_registration();
  216: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  217:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  218: 
  219: 
  220: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  221: %% Message tests
  222: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  223: 
  224: register(Config) ->
  225:     [{Name1, UserSpec1}, {Name2, UserSpec2}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice, bob]}),
  226:     [{_, AdminSpec}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [admin]}),
  227:     [Username1, Server1, _Pass1] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec1),
  228:     [Username2, Server2, _Pass2] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec2),
  229:     [AdminU, AdminS, AdminP] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, AdminSpec),
  230: 
  231:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, try_register, [AdminU, AdminS, AdminP]),
  232: 
  233:     escalus:story(Config, [{admin, 1}], fun(Admin) ->
  234:             escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [Name1, Name2]}),
  235: 
  236:             Predicates = [
  237:                           fun(Stanza) ->
  238:                                   Body = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"body">>}, cdata]),
  239:                                   escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Stanza)
  240:                                   andalso
  241:                                   re:run(Body, <<"registered">>, []) =/= nomatch
  242:                                   andalso
  243:                                   re:run(Body, Username, []) =/= nomatch
  244:                           end
  245:                           || Username <- [Username1, Username2]
  246:                          ],
  247:             escalus:assert_many(Predicates, escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Admin, 2))
  248:         end).
  249: 
  250: already_registered(Config) ->
  251: 
  252:     %% This relies on Alice already being registered in test case
  253:     %% `register' in the same group as this test (group `register').
  254: 
  255:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  256: 
  257:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:get_registration_fields()),
  258: 
  259:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  260: 
  261:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
  262:         true = has_registered_element(Stanza)
  263: 
  264:     end).
  265: 
  266: null_password(Config) ->
  267:     [{alice, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice]}),
  268:     Alice = {alice, lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Details, {password, <<>>})},
  269:     {error, _, Response} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  270:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Response),
  271:     %% This error response means there was no character data,
  272:     %% i.e. elements `<password\>' or `<password></password>' where
  273:     %% indeed present.
  274:     {username, Name} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, Details),
  275:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, Details),
  276:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"not-acceptable">>], Response),
  277:     false = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Name, Server]).
  278: 
  279: check_unregistered(Config) ->
  280:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [admin, alice, bob]}),
  281:     [{_, UserSpec}| _] = escalus_users:get_users(all),
  282:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
  283:     false = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Username, Server]).
  284: 
  285: bad_request_registration_cancelation(Config) ->
  286: 
  287:     %% To quote XEP 0077, section 3.2, table 1 (unregister error
  288:     %% cases): "The <remove/> element [is] not the only child element
  289:     %% of the <query/> element."
  290: 
  291:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  292: 
  293:         %% Alice sends bad cancelation request
  294:         escalus:send(Alice, bad_cancelation_stanza()),
  295: 
  296:         %% Alice receives failure response
  297:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  298:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  299:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>], Stanza)
  300: 
  301:     end).
  302: 
  303: not_allowed_registration_cancelation(Config) ->
  304: 
  305:     %% To quote XEP 0077, section 3.2, table 1 (unregister error
  306:     %% cases): "No sender is allowed to cancel registrations in-band."
  307: 
  308:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  309: 
  310:         %% Alice sends cancelation request
  311:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:remove_account()),
  312: 
  313:         %% Alice receives failure response
  314:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  315:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  316:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Stanza)
  317: 
  318:     end).
  319: 
  320: registration_timeout(Config) ->
  321:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT)),
  322:     [Alice, Bob] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice, bob]}),
  323: 
  324:     %% The first user should be created successfully
  325:     escalus_users:verify_creation(escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice)),
  326: 
  327:     %% Creation of the second one should err because of not timing out yet
  328:     {error, failed_to_register, Stanza} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Bob),
  329:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, Stanza),
  330:     %% Something else may be more acceptable for the assertion
  331:     %% below... 2nd paragraph, section 3.1.1, XEP 0077: [...] a server
  332:     %% MAY return a `<not-acceptable/>' stanza error if [...] an
  333:     %% entity attempts to register a second identity after
  334:     %% successfully completing the registration use case.
  335:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], Stanza),
  336: 
  337:     %% After timeout, the user should be registered successfully
  338:     timer:sleep(erlang:round(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT * 1.5 * 1000)),
  339:     escalus_users:verify_creation(escalus_users:create_user(Config, Bob)).
  340: 
  341: registration_failure_timeout(Config) ->
  342:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT)),
  343:     [Alice] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice]}),
  344: 
  345:     %% Registration of the first user should fail because of access denial
  346:     {error,failed_to_register,R} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  347:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, R),
  348:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], R),
  349: 
  350:     %% Registration of a second one should fail because requests were
  351:     %% made in quick succession
  352:     {error,failed_to_register,S} = escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  353:     escalus:assert(is_iq_error, S),
  354:     escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], S).
  355: 
  356: change_password(Config) ->
  357: 
  358:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  359: 
  360:         escalus:send(Alice,
  361:             Q = escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_INBAND_REGISTER,
  362:                 [#xmlel{name = <<"username">>,
  363:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"alice">>}]},
  364:                  #xmlel{name = <<"password">>,
  365:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = strong_pwd()}]}])),
  366: 
  367:         R = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  368: 
  369:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [Q], R)
  370: 
  371:     end).
  372: 
  373: change_password_to_null(Config) ->
  374: 
  375:     %% Section 3.3, XEP 0077: If the user provides an empty password
  376:     %% element or a password element that contains no XML character
  377:     %% data (i.e., either <password/> or <password></password>), the
  378:     %% server or service MUST NOT change the password to a null value,
  379:     %% but instead MUST maintain the existing password.
  380: 
  381:     %% By the above, `end_per_testcase' should succeed. XEP 0077
  382:     %% doesn't say how how an XMPP sever should respond, but since
  383:     %% this is in IQ, it must: so we choose to require a `not-allowed'
  384:     %% response.
  385: 
  386:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  387: 
  388:         escalus:send(Alice,
  389:             escalus_stanza:iq_set(?NS_INBAND_REGISTER,
  390:                 [#xmlel{name = <<"username">>,
  391:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"alice">>}]},
  392:                  #xmlel{name = <<"password">>,
  393:                         children = [#xmlcdata{content = <<"">>}]}])),
  394: 
  395:         R = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  396: 
  397:         escalus:assert(is_iq_error, R),
  398:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"modify">>, <<"bad-request">>], R)
  399: 
  400:     end).
  401: 
  402: log_one(Config) ->
  403:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  404: 
  405:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  406:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  407: 
  408:         end).
  409: 
  410: log_one_digest(Config) ->
  411:     log_one([{escalus_auth_method, <<"DIGEST-MD5">>} | Config]).
  412: 
  413: log_one_scram(Config) ->
  414:     log_one([{escalus_auth_method, <<"SCRAM-SHA-1">>} | Config]).
  415: 
  416: 
  417: log_non_existent_plain(Config) ->
  418:     {auth_failed, _, _} = log_non_existent(Config).
  419: 
  420: log_non_existent_digest(Config) ->
  421:     R = log_non_existent([{escalus_auth_method, <<"DIGEST-MD5">>} | Config]),
  422:     {expected_challenge, _, _} = R.
  423: 
  424: log_non_existent_scram(Config) ->
  425:     R = log_non_existent([{escalus_auth_method, <<"SCRAM-SHA-1">>} | Config]),
  426:     {expected_challenge, _, _} = R.
  427: 
  428: log_non_existent(Config) ->
  429:     [{kate, UserSpec}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [kate]}),
  430:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, R}} = escalus_client:start(Config, UserSpec, <<"res">>),
  431:     R.
  432: 
  433: blocked_user(_Config) ->
  434:     [{_, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice]}),
  435:     try
  436:         {ok, _Alice, _Spec2, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  437:         ct:fail("Alice authenticated but shouldn't")
  438:     catch
  439:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_iq_result, Stanza, _Bin} ->
  440:             <<"cancel">> = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"error">>}, {attr, <<"type">>}])
  441:     end,
  442:     ok.
  443: 
  444: messages_story(Config) ->
  445:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  446: 
  447:         % Alice sends a message to Bob
  448:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  449: 
  450:         % Bob gets the message
  451:         escalus_assert:is_chat_message(<<"Hi!">>, escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  452: 
  453:     end).
  454: 
  455: message_zlib_limit(Config) ->
  456:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  457:         [{_, Spec}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [hacker]}),
  458:         {ok, Hacker, _Spec2, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  459: 
  460:         ManySpaces = [ 32 || _N <- lists:seq(1, 10*1024) ],
  461: 
  462:         escalus:send(Hacker, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, ManySpaces)),
  463: 
  464:         escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>, <<"XML stanza is too big">>],
  465:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Hacker)),
  466:         escalus:assert(is_stream_end, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Hacker))
  467: 
  468:     end).
  469: 
  470: legacy_successful_digest(Config) ->
  471:     legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_digest).
  472: 
  473: legacy_successful_plain(Config) ->
  474:     legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_plain).
  475: legacy_unsuccessful_plain(Config) ->
  476:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  477:     NewSpec = lists:keyreplace(password, 1, Spec, {password, <<"wrong_pass">>}),
  478:     Users = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  479:     NewUsers = lists:keyreplace(alice, 1, Users, {alice, NewSpec}),
  480:     NewConfig = lists:keyreplace(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers}),
  481:     try
  482:         legacy_auth(NewConfig, legacy_auth_plain),
  483:         ct:fail("Authenticated but shouldn't")
  484:     catch
  485:         error:{assertion_failed,assert,is_iq_result,_,_,_} ->
  486:             ok
  487:     end.
  488: 
  489: legacy_auth(Config, Function) ->
  490:     %% given
  491:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  492:     Steps = [
  493:              %% when
  494:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  495:              {legacy_stream_helper, Function}
  496:             ],
  497:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  498:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  499:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  500: 
  501: 
  502: legacy_blocked_user(Config) ->
  503:     try
  504:         legacy_auth(Config, legacy_auth_plain),
  505:         ct:fail("alice authenticated but shouldn't")
  506:     catch
  507:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_iq_result, _, Stanza, _Bin} ->
  508:             <<"cancel">> = exml_query:path(Stanza,
  509:                                            [{element, <<"error">>},
  510:                                             {attr, <<"type">>}])
  511:     end.
  512: 
  513: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  514: %% Helpers
  515: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  516: 
  517: skip_if_mod_register_not_enabled(Config) ->
  518:     case escalus_users:is_mod_register_enabled(Config) of
  519:         true ->
  520:             Config; % will create users inside test case
  521:         _ ->
  522:             {skip, mod_register_disabled}
  523:     end.
  524: 
  525: strong_pwd() ->
  526:     <<"Sup3r","c4li","fr4g1","l1571c","3xp1","4l1","d0c10u5">>.
  527: 
  528: set_registration_timeout(Config) ->
  529:     Record = {local_config, registration_timeout, ?REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT},
  530:     OldTimeout = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  531:                                       [registration_timeout]),
  532:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ets, insert, [local_config, Record]),
  533:     [ {old_timeout, OldTimeout} | Config ].
  534: 
  535: restore_registration_timeout(Config) ->
  536:     {old_timeout, OldTimeout} = proplists:lookup(old_timeout, Config),
  537:     Record = {local_config, registration_timeout, OldTimeout},
  538:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ets, insert, [local_config, Record]),
  539:     proplists:delete(old_timeout, Config).
  540: 
  541: deny_everyone_registration() ->
  542:     ok = change_registration_settings_for_everyone(deny).
  543: 
  544: allow_everyone_registration() ->
  545:     ok = change_registration_settings_for_everyone(allow).
  546: 
  547: change_registration_settings_for_everyone(Rule)
  548:   when allow =:= Rule; deny =:= Rule ->
  549:     {atomic,ok} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_global_option,
  550:         [{access, register, global}, [{Rule, all}]]),
  551:     ok.
  552: 
  553: get_client_details(Identifier) ->
  554:     [{Identifier, Details}] = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [Identifier]}),
  555:     {username, Name} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, Details),
  556:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, Details),
  557:     {string(Name), string(Server)}.
  558: 
  559: get_auth_method() ->
  560:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  561:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  562:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, store_type,
  563:                          [XMPPDomain]).
  564: 
  565: set_store_password(Type) ->
  566:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  567:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  568:     AuthOpts = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  569:                                     [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}]),
  570:     NewAuthOpts = lists:keystore(password_format, 1, AuthOpts, {password_format, Type}),
  571:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_local_option,
  572:                          [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}, NewAuthOpts]).
  573: 
  574: 
  575: 
  576: config_password_format(login_scram) ->
  577:     set_store_password(scram);
  578: config_password_format(_) ->
  579:     set_store_password(plain).
  580: 
  581: assert_password_format(GroupName, Config) ->
  582:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config),
  583:     [verify_format(GroupName, User) || User <- Users],
  584:     Config.
  585: 
  586: verify_format(GroupName, {_User, Props}) ->
  587:     Username = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(proplists:get_value(username, Props)),
  588:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, Props),
  589:     Password = proplists:get_value(password, Props),
  590: 
  591:     SPassword = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, get_password, [Username, Server]),
  592:     do_verify_format(GroupName, Password, SPassword).
  593: 
  594: do_verify_format(login_scram, _Password, SPassword) ->
  595:     %% returned password is a tuple containing scram data
  596:     {_, _, _, _} = SPassword;
  597: do_verify_format(_, Password, SPassword) ->
  598:     Password = SPassword.
  599: 
  600: has_registered_element(Stanza) ->
  601:         [#xmlel{name = <<"registered">>}] =:= exml_query:paths(Stanza,
  602:             [{element, <<"query">>}, {element, <<"registered">>}]).
  603: 
  604: bad_cancelation_stanza() ->
  605:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>,
  606:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:iq:register">>}],
  607:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"remove">>},
  608:                     %% The <remove/> element is not the only child element of the
  609:                     %% <query/> element.
  610:                     #xmlel{name = <<"foo">>}]}]).
  611: 
  612: restart_mod_register_with_option(Config, Name, Value) ->
  613:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  614:     ModuleOptions = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, loaded_modules_with_opts, [Domain]),
  615:     {mod_register, OldRegisterOptions} = lists:keyfind(mod_register, 1, ModuleOptions),
  616:     {atomic, ok} = dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_register),
  617:     NewRegisterOptions = lists:keystore(Name, 1, OldRegisterOptions, Value),
  618:     ok = dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_register, NewRegisterOptions),
  619:     [{old_mod_register_opts, OldRegisterOptions}|Config].
  620: 
  621: restore_mod_register_options(Config0) ->
  622:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config0),
  623:     {value, {old_mod_register_opts, RegisterOpts}, Config1} =
  624:         lists:keytake(old_mod_register_opts, 1, Config0),
  625:     {atomic, ok} = dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_register),
  626:     ok = dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_register, RegisterOpts),
  627:     Config1.
  628: 
  629: user_exists(Name, Config) ->
  630:     {Name, Client} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(Name),
  631:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, Client),
  632:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, is_user_exists, [Username, Server]).
  633: 
  634: string(<<_/binary>> = Subject) ->
  635:     erlang:binary_to_list(Subject).
